content: I am a PhD Student at Laboratoire Jacques Louis-Lions, Sorbonne University under the supervision of Pierre-Alexandre Bliman. I am also part of the Team MAMBA at Inria Paris. My research is about mathematical analysis, modeling and command of epidemic dynamics including reinfections.

title: Marcel Fang
